user.rawDescription: Former German Nazi concentration & extermination camp Auschwitz. Official account. We commemorate victims, educate about history & preserve the authentic site.

rawContent:
1 June 1941 | A German Sinti boy, Adam Lehmann, was born in Friedberg. 

In #Zigeunerlager (Gypsy camp) in #Auschwitz II-Birkenau from 13 March 1943.
No. Z-2391
He perished in the camp on 27 April 1943.
